channel.title: bgamari.github.com
channel.description: Various ramblings, generally of a technical nature

item.title: Adventures in devicetree land
item.description: One experience debugging the transition to a devicetree-enable kernel on the BeagleBoard

item.title: Installing Amber 11 and AmberTools 1.5 on Ubuntu 11.04
item.description: My experience installing the Amber 11 Molecular Dynamics package on Ubuntu 11.04.

item.title: Building BeagleDAQ and Tracker environment
item.description: Compiling the software environment for the BeagleDAQ and particle tracker

item.title: Installing OpenMM and GROMACS with AMBER force-field
item.description: Installing the GROMACS molecular dynamics package with GPU acceleration and the AMBER force-field.

item.title: Cross-compiling LLVM for ARM on Ubuntu
item.description: A short guide on building the LLVM compiler framework to run on an ARM target

item.title: Toner transfer PCB etching in a (bio)physics laboratory
item.description: My methodology for PCB etching via toner transfer

item.title: Installing LLVM and GHC on ARM
item.description: A tutorial for building LLVM and the Glasgow Haskell compiler on a ARM box

item.title: Self-built kernels on Linaro
item.description: Building custom kernels for Linaro

item.title: JTAG debugging with a Bus Pirate, OpenOCD, and LPC1768
item.description: Debugging an LPC1768 target over JTAG with a Bus Pirate and OpenOCD

item.title: Getting started with mchck
item.description: Initial steps with the mchck microcontroller design

item.title: Endnote to Bibtex without pain
item.description: In which an Endnote bibliography is converted to BibTeX

item.title: Running mesa from git on Ubuntu
item.description: Testing mesa from git on Ubuntu

item.title: GHC on ARM update
item.description: Status upon on my work in making the Glasgow Haskell Compiler run on the ARM architecture

item.title: A brief introduction to embedded development
item.description: Some notes on embedded development written up for a friend.

item.title: Getting started with HackRF Jawbreaker
item.description: A tutorial for bringing up the HackRF Jawbreaker

item.title: Notes concerning LPC43xx and OpenOCD
item.description: Some of my notes taken while bringing up the LPC4330 with OpenOCD

item.title: Flashing the BusBlaster's CPLD buffer with OpenOCD
item.description: Flashing the BusBlaster JTAG adapter's CPLD buffer with OpenOCD

item.title: Debugging stream fusion performance
item.description: Some tips for debugging performance of Haskell programs using stream fusion

item.title: Making Ubuntu usable with XMonad
item.description: Configuration Ubuntu around XMonad

item.title: Running modern kernel on the PandaBoard
item.description: Bringing up the v3.12 kernel on the PandaBoard

item.title: The state of GHC on ARM
item.description: A brief history of my efforts in bringing first-class ARM support to GHC
